meanings.definition: Enrolled in a class or program beyond its capacity.
meanings.sent1: The overenrolled class had students sitting on the floor due to lack of desks.
meanings.sent2: The school was overenrolled, causing a shortage of textbooks for all students.
meanings.sent3: The overenrolled art class had so many students that they had to share paintbrushes.
meanings.sent4: The overenrolled gym was bursting at the seams with eager participants.
meanings.sent5: The overenrolled music class was so crowded that some students had to stand in the back.

meanings.definition: Having more students or participants than the maximum allowed.
meanings.sent1: The overenrolled daycare had to hire extra staff to accommodate all the children.
meanings.sent2: The event was overenrolled, leading to long lines and delays at the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The overenrolled swimming pool was so full that it looked like a giant bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The overenrolled bus struggled to fit all the passengers during rush hour.
meanings.sent5: The overenrolled restaurant had a waiting list stretching out the door.
